Package org.apache.turbine.util.velocity

Velocity related utility code.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
VelocityActionEvent If you are using VelocitySite stuff, then your Action's should extend this class instead of extending the ActionEvent class.
VelocityEmail This is a simple class for sending email from within Velocity.
VelocityHtmlEmail This is a simple class for sending html email from within Velocity.
 

Exception Summary
VelocityEmailException This exception is thrown if a VelocityEmail/VelocityHtmlEmail can not be sent using JavaMail.
 

Package org.apache.turbine.util.velocity Description

Velocity related utility code.
